item.title: Multilevel Elasticities for a Single SKU - Part III.
item.description: In this notebook we continue our simulation study for elasticities, see: Multilevel Elasticities for a Single SKU - Part I Multilevel Elasticities for a Single SKU - Part II for an introduction to the problem and some models. We extend the covariance model to allow two covariance components on both the intercepts and slopes (coefficient of the median_ income variable). Also, to abstract from a specific framework, we do the implementation in NumPyro.
